project_identity.name: India ERW Simulator
project_identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode Only (Scientific Standard) with High-Contrast Data

rules: Use JetBrains Mono for all numerical data, coordinates, and chemical formulas (e.g., pCO2).
Headings should be Dark Slate (slate-900), Body should be Slate-600.

layout_system.spacing_scale: Relaxed (gap-6 for dashboard, gap-12 for landing)
rules: Use 'Grid Borders' style: visible 1px borders between grid items to mimic a spreadsheet/lab report.
Always use a sidebar layout for the main app navigation.

cards.style: Flat, 1px border (slate-200), no shadow by default. Shadow-sm on hover.

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:text-slate-900

inputs.style: bg-white border-slate-200 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500 rounded-md h-10

charts.style: Minimal axes, grid lines dashed (stroke-dasharray='3 3'), custom tooltips with glassmorphism.

maps.style: Grayscale base map (fill='#E2E8F0'), vibrant data points. Tooltips on hover.

images.lab_texture: Use CSS radial-gradient dots for background texture.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetrical grids.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through z-index and subtle borders, not heavy shadows.
Data-testid attributes are MANDATORY for all interactive elements.
Use Shadcn components for complex interactions (Dialog, Select, Popover) but styled to match the theme.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup the font families in index.css (import Work Sans and JetBrains Mono).
2. Configure tailwind.config.js to extend colors with the scientific palette.
3. Create a 'DashboardLayout' component with a sidebar and a top bar.
4. Implement the 'ERW Simulator' using a Bento Grid layout.
5. Use Recharts for all data visualizations. Customize the Tooltip to be a glassmorphic card.
6. Ensure the India Map is interactive and colored by CDR potential.
7. Create a 'Chatbot' floating widget or sidebar panel using the AI Assistant.
8. Strictly follow the spacing and color rules defined here.
